response.message: While I agree that Skyrim and MW3 are big games, no love for Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3?  Really?  gaming.so seems to be horribly suited for fighting games.

Elder Scrolls all the way.

Daggerfall still ranks as one of my all-time favorite RPG's... Ah, the memories.
Is it bad that I don't care at all about either of these games?

I LOVE ultimate Marvel Vs Capcom 3!! Let's do it!

How is gaming.se suited poorly for fighting questions? I'd love to ask / answer fighting game questions.... Bring em on!
@Rocket - do you by any chance have a life?

Don't let me break out my mortal kombat 3.
Ill have to finish you...
skyrim is more good  cod mw3 is only wars.. :P
